 Nightstrike::
"We almost captured a Autobot shuttle..."replied Nightstrike"If you want, my creator, we can forget it and come back to help U"
  x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: -- Switchblade --

Switchblade fixes the key memories, then removes his precence from 
Perceptor's memory banks. His eyes rekindle themselves as he comes 
out of his state of meditation.

"Grr, that took far too long." He removes all the cords that he'd 
attached, and confirmed that the head he'd made was attached 
properly. He grabs Perceptor and begins to drag the bot off the 
table. After teh bot is off the table, he drags it to the elevator.

He opens a commlink to his allies, "Firstrike, Nightstrike. I was in 
the middle of something and couldn't be reached, what is going on 
with you two." He continues to drag the heavy bot.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  OOC: Don't worry  :)
> Perceptor::
> The virus was stopped and computers  reported that  the virus was 
neutralized. Soon some Perceptor's memories will be erased and he 
would be ready to a reprogramation if Swichblade wished
